item.title: Gold’s Vertiginous Ascent Isn’t Over Yet, Fund Managers Say
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Gold’s rally to successive all-time highs isn’t over, according to macro fund managers interviewed by Bloomberg, with the factors that have powered a near-20% surge since mid-February expected to fuel more gains. The gains have been fueled by expectations for the US Federal Reserve to...

item.title: DWS compra activos a X-Elio y aterriza en renovables en España
item.author: Expansión
item.description:
Miguel Ã. Patiño.Madrid
La gestora de activos alemana DWS ha adquirido al grupo español de renovables X-Elio tres plantas solares fotovoltaicas en España que suman una capacidad de 147 megavatios (MW), informó la gestora de activos alemana, que no precisó el importe de la operación.
Estos tres pr...
